description:
Your dream of a bonded, satisfying connection with the man you love is attainable and worth it, with just a little each day and some secret knowledge to help you get there.

Build a Foundation for Lasting Love with a small commitment of time

Enjoy:

·         Connecting conversations

·         More pleasure in the bedroom

·         Deep, satisfying intimacy

Communicate in a Way He Understands

Learn:

·         How to share your needs

·         How to speak so your man can hear you

·         The value of communicating your deepest thoughts with each other

Open to More Pleasure

Learn:

·         How to meet your requirements so you can let go into bliss

·         How to build trust and safety so you can surrender to his touch and love

Enjoy Consistent, Great Intimacy

·         Get on the same page as your lover and focus on bonding your love through 

          pleasure and satisfaction

·         Understand his view is opposite to you and learn to meet in the middle

Topic and Overview

I am passionate about helping you to build a strong, loving relationship, full of pleasure and joy. I've been coaching women one on one regarding intimacy for many years and I've written three books about intimacy. I decided that I could reach more women with an online course.  This course includes my three books, 14 videos, worksheets, homework and sexercises that are all design to help you care for yourself and grow closer with your partner. If you can commit to spending five minutes a day on improving your relationship, magical change can happen and you can have the relationship you desire.

Summary

This course is respectful of your needs and desires and I strive to give you the tools to thrive within your relationship. Through this course I will help you to know what your role is in creating your ideal union. The course includes the specific steps that you can take to feel what you need to feel in order to be a happy, fulfilled woman.
title: 5 Minutes a Day Relationship Building Plan
